title: intec
author: intec
content: For those who don't know - Cryptopia.co.nz was a self hacked exchangeUnnamed.exchange is an on-going scam exchangeBoth are ran by ssadam and tilkoeln.Case to say y'all "oops i did it again"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CduA0TULnowedit - I want to see Lafu comment now like he used to do to get attention and post count on announcements section.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: So what? You got a beef with Lafu? PM him FFS... Why start a thread about a shitty ass exchange and implicate a user here about it? Seems like you got  beef with Lafu, not this board, so why bother? BTW, your trust is absolute shit. So  why would anyone believe you anyhow? Dumbass...

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: I'm not sure how you came to conclude that the same group manages both (Cryptopia and unnamed) sites, I guess you have unambiguous evidence.About unnamed.exchange, A long -open discussion about the fraud from there [Warning] Unnamed.exchange - do we have another exit scam? I believe there is no need to open new useless discussions on this topic.Interestingly, you give your moral objections to someone after all you are marked.  Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=829024 YOSHIE    2020-06-03    Reference    Scamer, the dumbest troll, takes action when not given a loan, avoid this scamer.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=829024 bob123    2020-06-02    Reference    Supports HYIP scams for financial gain.

comments.author: intec
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 23, 2023, 01:00:50 PMI'm not sure how you came to conclude that the same group manages both (Cryptopia and unnamed) sites, I guess you have unambiguous evidence.About unnamed.exchange, A long -open discussion about the fraud from there [Warning] Unnamed.exchange - do we have another exit scam? I believe there is no need to open new useless discussions on this topic.Interestingly, you give your moral objections to someone after all you are marked.  Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=829024 YOSHIE    2020-06-03    Reference    Scamer, the dumbest troll, takes action when not given a loan, avoid this scamer.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=829024 bob123    2020-06-02    Reference    Supports HYIP scams for financial gain.Well I believe there is, cause BOTH are connected.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Is it a thread about cryptopia/unnamed.exchanged or Lafu? You should make it clear. And where did you get the message that cryptopia was self hacked exchange? In the above video? I haven't checked though. I was following the cryptopia discussion for a while but have never seen any claim of such self hacking drama. I think you should visualize more info on what you have claimed.
